Economy.title: Introduction
Economy.description: Welcome to the Economy plugin! This system adds a fun and competitive way to interact with other users. Earn coins, spend them on special items, and compete with others to dominate the leaderboard. Let's get started!

Economy.title: Earning Money
Economy.description:
Start building your wealth by earning money through commands:
 - `/daily`: Redeem a daily boost.
 - `/work`: Complete a task to earn coins.
 - `/beg`: Beg for people to give you spare change.
 - `/dig`: Try your luck by digging a hole.
 - `/search`: Search for coins in unlikely places.

Economy.title: Spending Money
Economy.description:
Once you've earned enough coins, it's time to spend them! Use `/shop view` to explore items available for purchase:
 - Buy fun or useful items to enhance your experience.
 - Invest in items that provide perks or boost your status.
 - Save up for rare or high-value items to show off your wealth!

Economy.title: Robbing
Economy.description:
Feeling adventurous? Test your skills and luck with `/rob`:
 - Attempt to steal coins from another user.
 - Success means gaining their coins, but failure might cost you a fine!
 - Be strategicâ€”choose your targets wisely and time your heists carefully!
